lead_paragraph: Opposition leaders angrily called on citizens to take to the streets after the electoral commission suspended a drive for a referendum to remove the president.

byline.contributor: Patricia Torres reported from Caracas and Elisabeth Malkin from Mexico City.
byline.original: By PATRICIA TORRES and ELISABETH MALKIN

headline.print_headline: Electoral Panel Halts Effort to Recall Venezuelan Leader
headline.main: Venezuelan Electoral Panel Halts Effort to Recall President Nicolás Maduro

snippet: Opposition leaders angrily called on citizens to take to the streets after the electoral commission suspended a drive for a referendum to remove the president....
abstract: Venezuela's opposition party urges citizens to protest after country's electoral commission suspends push for referendum to remove Pres Nicolas Maduro from power.
